sentence.text: We used bivariate and multivariate analyses to examine the variations in the rates of TMA complications according to negative regulation of cell adhesion, age, bile acid metabolic process, and comorbid conditions, including nonpalpable pedal pulses, end-stage renal disease, coronary artery disease, hypertension, smoking status, and preoperative albumin AAAA3.5â€‰mg/dL.
